                      throws VotingAccessException,
                             VoteException,

        Description copied from interface: AcceptVoteFacade
        Accept new vote to voting
        Specified by:
        acceptVote in interface AcceptVoteFacade
        Parameters:
        user - voted user
        optionId - voted option ID in voting
        votedIp - IP which sent vote
        votingKey - voting key from client
        Returns:
        updated voting option
        Throws:
        VotingAccessException - if voting key is invalid
        VoteException - if voting accept only one vote per IP and votedIp already vote
        NotFoundException
        See Also:
